description: Try our easy to follow Corn & Ricotta Fritters + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Corn & Ricotta Fritters + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Corn Fritters: Whisk together egg, cheese and milk. Gradually whisk in flour until smooth and combined. Stir in corn.

Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Lightly spray with oil. Spoon heaped tablespoons of mixture into pan to cook 4 fritters at a time. Cook for 2 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Repeat to make a total of 12 fritters.

Place a third of fritters in an airtight container, Pack next to cool brick in lunch box to keep cool. Freeze leftover fritters, wrapped in plastic, for up to 1 month. Chicken Skewers: Cut into cubes and grill chicken breast. Turning for 3 minutes or until cooked through.

On 2 wooden skewers, thread chicken alternately with capsicum and cheese cubes. Snack 1: Snack 1: Cut apple into wedges and place sliced apple in a plastic container in lunch box. 2: Place crackers in a plastic container in lunch box.
